Victims of forced displacement, informal sector workers, elderly, members of ethnic communities, people with disabilities, members of the public force and their families when the member of the public forces has died in service.
Social housing is a competency of municipalities. Targets low-income; assessment should be non-discriminatory. Common criteria: any household member owns residential property.
Everyone is eligible; in some organisations, studying or being employed may skip the waiting list.
